description:
Up until Ubuntu 21, this app was working flawlessly. 

After upgrading to Ubuntu 22, it stared acting up. 

Even after having saved details of an app in the menu, it continues to show a pop-out window that I cannot cancel. If I click the ave button again, it duplicates the app shortcut.

The only way that I was able to stop this process was to start the System Monitor and manually Kill the Menu Editor process.

Very frustrating...
